help.short: Delete you delete a resource group, all of its resources are also deleted. Deleting a resource group deletes all of its template deployments and currently stored operations.
Checks whether a resource group exists.
List all the resource groups for a subscription.

Update groups can be updated through a simple PATCH operation to a group address. The format of the request is the same as that for creating a resource group. If a field is unspecified, the current value is retained.
